data.message: Hey Facebook, my friend Lotoya Williams Facebook page has been deactivated for over a week.  I can vouch for her as a real person and not a spammer.  She's still receiving notifications but is unable to login and she isn't listed on my friend's list when I search for her by name.  Can you reactivate her account, please?

replies.message: Hi Jonathan. If your friend believes that her account was disabled by mistake, she can submit an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2uQe2Mi. -Jessica
